name: reQuest
description: An app uses virtual currency karma points to get help from other people or give help and receive karma points

name: Daily News Sense Client
description: Client Side of a news web app. Geolocation, UI language selection, Stripe payment features are used in this project

name: Daily News Sense Editorial
description: Editorial admin web app for controlling Daily News Sense. Journalist and Editors have different privilages

name: Cooper Test
description: A cooper test tracker for your own performance working with Rails API backend, Chart.js is used for drawing up nice performance graphs

name: InstaFood
description: A restaurant app where you can order food online, Rails API backend is used to handle users and orders

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A classical RPS game where you can activate cheat, enter your name and save your score

name: Library
description: A virtual library living in Ruby,It has 32 books which you can checkout and return but never read.

name: ATM Machine
description: An ATM in Ruby,lets you open an account,withdraw,deposit money which you actually don't have.

name: Address Book
description: An address book in Javascript, you can save your Friends's info,edit,delete them (if you have any).

name: Kermit Homepage
description: You can learn about Kermit and purchase merchandise (at least you can try to).
